has_description: Summertime is coming and the weather is getting hot, so what about having nice SPORT NATURE CAMP day together? dir Do you like the ide of staying outside surrounded by nature, breathing fresh air, doing some sport, and having real BBQ dinner with some cold drinks? We are happy to invite you to share with us your best RAFTING/ experience!!!!  dir Program:/ dir We leave on the 31st of May in the morning and we are back to Trento on the 1st of June at lunchtime roughly. We will take train that brings us to picturesque place of Daolas in Val di Sole. Then we'll have an about two hours rafting experience together with the rafting centre experts who will explain all the details and give all the instructions to us and accompany us during the activity. dir 31st May (timing may be sunject to changes)/ dir  li10:30 Meeting at train station li12:30 Arrival in Daolas and having our packed lunch li14:00 Rafting first group li16:00 Rafting second grou (if needed) li18:00 BBQ preparation ul dir 1st June/ dir  li9:00 Breakfast li13:00 Departure from Daolosa li15:00 Arrival in Trento ul dir * * * * * * * * * * * * FAQs * * * * * * * * * * * *  dir What is RAFTING ?  dir Rafting is fun activity that consists of descending river with rapids in specially designed rubber raft in waters, manned by team of various participants who follow the guide's instructions. The voyage will include some moments in the rapids and also peaceful moments where you can just relax and enjoy the spectacular landscapes.  dir Do I need some special training or should I be in perfect shape?/ dir Absolutely not! No supernatural abilities are required. You don't need any previous rafting experience but just bit of taste for adventure. The only thing is that you should feel comfortable about being on the water (because you will have it around you for couple of hours) and that's it! dir What should I bring with me?/ dir The most important thing you need is your perfect and some stuff that could be really useful to have with you (so BRING it with YOU!/): dir  (better synthetic or microfleece one); pair of sneakers (they will get WET!!!); li li warm clothes lunch ul dir The participation FEE is only 30 euros and includes:/ dir  lirafting tour (about 2 hours); liall necessary equipment; liround tri di lione night in cam (we will provide tents for everyone, but feel free to bring your own one if you want); liBBQ dinner (drinks included); libreakfast (only cold drinks) ul pAll the details to sign u can be found on the 10:30 to 01/06/2015 13:00
